Spring has virtually sprung! Too dangerous it is nonetheless fairly chilly in most locations throughout the U.S.

Fortunate for us, Olivia Munn‘s shearling-lined jacket from Ann Taylor is now on sale for $forty eight.88, down from $198. The actress wore the price range-pleasant topper whereas working in Toronto final week (so it is obtained to be fairly cozy). She layered the jacket with an all-white ensemble, together with a white hoodie, cropped tee and excessive-waist denims. Snow-bunny stylish? Extra like snow-bunny robust!

You could have reservations about shopping for a winter coat or any chilly-climate piece so late within the season, however truly, it is one of the best time to take action. Retailers put their winter put on on main sale to allow them to make room for spring stock. Get a number of extra weeks’ use out of this celeb-authorised staple, then put on it every single day come subsequent fall.
